name: NicLine
overview:
NicLine is an ICANN accredited registrar that offers wholesale domain name registration services. It deals with over 4,000 active wholesalers, more than 370,000 registered domains and with clients in nearly 90 countries. Nicline stresses its competitive pricing and solid customer service.

NicLine has been accredited by ICANN as a registrar company since December, 2001.

NicLine considers ISPs, web design agencies, publicity companies, patent and trademarks agencies, hosting providers and domain sales businesses its target market. It is working to increase the number of extensions its clients can register through its tools, and continue its competitively priced business model. In 2006, Nicline partnered with Cube Panel; the partnership allowed Cube Panel customers a number of registration services previously unavailable to them. In 2007, Nicline partnered with Sedo to offer its clients an integrated management of their Sedo account via their Nicline toolbar, and domain appraisals, brokerage services, domain sales promotion and domain parking. In 2009, Nicline promoted its RSP service by offering it during a free trial perido. Nicline has been known to emphasize .com alternative TLDs, such as in 2006 when it offered special pricing on an unlimited number of .info domains.
